About Us

  1. Home
  2. About Us

WE WELCOME YOU TO AAZIZ & CO. ACCOUNTANTS AND TAX CONSULTANTS

We are a team of Chartered Certified Accountants and legal consultants for all aspects of Accountancy, Taxation, commercial lease, legal business acquisition, mergers and sales transactions.

We are based in London, providing comprehensive and professional accountancy services and Tax advice and practical support to local small and medium businesses alike.

Our team of qualified accountants who have valuable experience in advising, monitoring, and co ordinating with clients to make sure that all necessary regulatory requirements are fulfilled.

We are a friendly & approachable, independent registered firm of Professional accountants, operating from modern welcoming offices.

We deal with every aspect of your tax, ranging from the preparation and submission of your self-assessment tax returns to pro-actively managing your tax affairs for partnerships, Limited companies and contractor ship.

Aziz and Co have the ability to offer comprehensive tailor-made solutions to its diversified clientele. The highly experienced and skilled management team of AAziz & Co. Accountants is capable of performing complex and daunting tasks seamlessly while meeting tight deadlines.

Our team is focused on building long-term relationships and craft practical, and affordable solutions for the best interest of our respectable clients.

Testimonials

We have been providing our services within London since past 13 Years

We offer a special packages for start-ups

just contact our certified consultants who will help you in:

  • Choosing the best format for your business; whether it is suitable for you or for Sole Trader/Limited Company (LLP) as the business format has implications for taxation, raising finance and personal liability, so it's vital to choose the right option.
  • Helping you to decide which Bank is more useful for you In the long run for your businessand explain well all the pros and cons of each choice.
  • Helping you to decide whether to register for VAT or Not, and which Scheme to choose from Standard or Flat rate.
